sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect} from "react"; import WeatherForecastService from '../service/WeatherForecastService'; import {getWeatherDescription, displayDateTime, convertTemperature} from '../businessLogic/WeatherBusinessLogic'; import {temperatureDropdownList} from '../buildingBlocks/commonBuildingBlocks.js' function WeatherForecastComponent(props){ console.log("som vo forecast component") console.log("props: " + JSON.stringify(props.history.location.state)) const [dailyWeatherForecast, setDailyWeatherForecast] = useState({} ) const [temperatureUnits, setTemperatureUnits] = useState({units: "celsius"}) useEffect(() =>{ console.log("som v useEffect forecast component") WeatherForecastService.getDailyForecastByCityName(props.history.location.state.lat,props.history.location.state.lon, "Current,Hourly,Minutely"). then( response => setDailyWeatherForecast(response.data)) }, [props.history.location.state.lat, props.history.location.state.lon]) return (
{temperatureDropdownList( (temperatureUnits ) => { setTemperatureUnits(temperatureUnits)}) } {createHeader.call()} {createMainBody(dailyWeatherForecast, temperatureUnits)}
) } const getTemperatureFormat = (temperature, temperatureUnits) => { if (temperatureUnits == 'kelvin') return `${temperature}K` if (temperatureUnits == 'celsius') return `${temperature}째C` if (temperatureUnits == 'fahrenheit') return `${temperature}째F` } const createMainBody = (dailyWeatherForecast, temperatureUnits) => { return ( dailyWeatherForecast?.daily?.map(dailyWeather =>{ return( {displayDateTime(new Date(dailyWeather.dt * 1000))} {displayDateTime(new Date(dailyWeather.sunrise * 1000))} {displayDateTime(new Date(dailyWeather.sunset * 1000))} {getTemperatureFormat(convertTemperature(temperatureUnits, dailyWeather.temp.day).toFixed(2), temperatureUnits)} {getTemperatureFormat(convertTemperature(temperatureUnits, dailyWeather.temp.min).toFixed(2), temperatureUnits)} {getTemperatureFormat(convertTemperature(temperatureUnits, dailyWeather.temp.max).toFixed(2), temperatureUnits)} {getTemperatureFormat(convertTemperature(temperatureUnits, dailyWeather.temp.night).toFixed(2), temperatureUnits)} {getTemperatureFormat(convertTemperature(temperatureUnits, dailyWeather.temp.eve).toFixed(2), temperatureUnits)} {getTemperatureFormat(convertTemperature(temperatureUnits, dailyWeather.temp.morn).toFixed(2), temperatureUnits)} {getTemperatureFormat(convertTemperature(temperatureUnits, dailyWeather.feels_like.day).toFixed(2), temperatureUnits)} {getTemperatureFormat(convertTemperature(temperatureUnits, dailyWeather.feels_like.night).toFixed(2), temperatureUnits)} {getTemperatureFormat(convertTemperature(temperatureUnits, dailyWeather.feels_like.eve).toFixed(2), temperatureUnits)} {getTemperatureFormat(convertTemperature(temperatureUnits, dailyWeather.feels_like.morn).toFixed(2), temperatureUnits)} {dailyWeather.dew_point} {dailyWeather.wind_speed} {dailyWeather.wind_deg} {dailyWeather.weather[0].icon} {dailyWeather.weather[0].id} {getWeatherDescription(dailyWeather)} {dailyWeather.weather[0].main} {dailyWeather.clouds} {dailyWeather.pop} {dailyWeather.uvi} {dailyWeather.rain} {dailyWeather.snow} ) }) ) } const createHeader = () => { return ( dt sunrise sunset temp min max night evening morning feels like day feels like night feels like evening feels like morning dew point wind speed wind deg icon id description main clouds pop uvi rain snow ) } export default WeatherForecastComponent
